title: The New Eve
body:
So, if like noone plays her, legit noone, will they swap her back?
I pray thats the case.

Literally ruined her, Nerfed her early game, EVE ONLY HAS EARLY GAME. She gets more pathetic as time goes on.
Whoever came up with these changes, whoever approved them, and whoever made them, should all be FIRED.

replies.body:
You need those early kills you get, which you only get with eve BECAUSE, stealth before level 6.... ARGH.
And this ult of hers, omfg..... There goes survivability in group fights... Instead of surviving and being included in the team fight, lets just do one attack AND THEN LEAVE EVERYONE TO DIE
Don't even bring up the hate spike animation and skill shot, which stops you firing it off while running for your life....
And instead of a speed up, we get a horrible crap slow? That even shows where we are? the fact you make it only shows to one person doesn't matter, everyone talks on discord, the moment you show us to one person, THEY  WILL ALL KNOW WHERE WE ARE... JUST WOW 
WE NEED TO BE ABLE TO RUN IN AND GET THE HELL OUT, not slow someone down.....
her ult does fucking 800 (+150% AP)(more than veigars at 30% hp) to enemies below 30% hp, its used as an execute then to blink away to safety from tower dives and shit
Also, cant you ult towards the enemy by shooting it behind you like thresh? You get a giant flash but you loose like soooo much potential damage..............

why do that when your e literally pulls you to them if you use it from invis.

Also realise that she will be with new runes.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=clHFi9xPKG4

We have a speed up with the empowered E, and the slow on the W is only if you cancel it early (in which case you get a FULL MANA REFUND). If you wait just a little bit, you get some decent hard CC plus tonnes of bonus damage, not to mention W has a HUGE cast range. Imagine the mind games you can do: W an enemy when taking a nearby camp, but don't do anything. They'll probably run away even though you won't be a threat. 

Using her charm is a mechanic we will have to get used to for pre-6 ganks. 

Also, you can use Hate Spike while running away... You don't even actually have to land the skillshot in order to use the spikes.

You're seeing this from the wrong perspective I think. You're looking at it and still thinking about how these changes will affect current Eve, they wont!
This isn't a change to Evelynn, its a completely new champ with her name on it.

New abilities, new scalings, new base stats, new growth stats, new playstyle. Everything.
Eve is gone now, this is a new champion who just happens to be called Evelynn and have an invisible mechanic.

The same way that Yorick and Poppy are new champions, and the old ones were removed.

You can't look at these changes in the context of old Eve, new Eve is a completely new champ, any baggage that old Eve had, does not apply to new Eve.

Her strong early game and need for kills early in order to survive late, are things that old Eve has. The new eve might play completely differently.
She might have a brutal late game, who knows yet.

I can sympathise with the opposition to change, Riot recently butchered my main champ!
Im not saying you can't mourn old Eve, nor am I saying that you should like new Eve, feel free to hate her and Riot if you want, I'm just saying that you have to view new Eve as hew own seperate champion, and not look at her in the context of old eve.  She isn't supposed to be exactly like old eve. 

Make your decisions of how good it is. not on how it'll affect old eve, but how you'll enjoy playing new eve.
Man I never thought "Champion Update" meant lets scrap this old champion and make a completely new one with the same name.
It means eve mark 1 is dead in the hopes of eve mark 2 being better....... Like how Iron-man made stronger suits..............
this would be close to eve mark 7
Also if you hasn't realised, the invis comes at 5 because the healing would be a broke joke when in the jungle pre 6, because she just heals out the damage at no cost
